incidents.title: Assets can't be viewed on backend site
incidents.description: Assets can't be viewed on backend site - server returns a 500 error
incidents.content:
2021-05-10T13:13:00.000Z
Resolved

Fix has been pushed

2021-05-10T12:00:00.000Z
Identified

Cause has been traced to an issue with an earlier update

incidents.title: File/Image uploads are failing
incidents.description: File and Image uploads are failing
incidents.content:
2021-03-09T17:25:00.000Z
Resolved

Uploader has been replaced, and uploads are succeeding again

2021-03-09T16:00:00.000Z
Identified

Cause has been traced to an issue with the earlier migration

incidents.title: AdamRMS down for migration to new Cloud Platform
incidents.description: To resolve performance issues, AdamRMS is ending its trial of a serverless public cloud platform early and moving to a more traditional server stack
incidents.content:
2021-03-09T16:35:00.000Z
Completed

Migration was a success, systems are back online. Please report any issues via the normal support channels

2021-03-09T16:00:00.000Z
Troubleshooting

An issue with a HTTP redirect is causing timeouts, updates are being pushed

2021-03-09T13:00:00.000Z
Planned

Migration is planned

incidents.title: Poor pageload performance
incidents.description: Pageload time is slower than usual for AdamRMS dashboard users
incidents.content:
2021-03-07T10:00:00.000Z
Completed

This has been resolved by a migration to a new server platform. Migration has meant pageload times have dropped to around 12% of previous levels. For example loading a large asset list has dropped from 4.5s to 521 ms.

2021-03-07T10:00:00.000Z
Identified

Cause has been traced to increased latency on the interconnect between the production website servers and the database. We're working with the server suppliers to develop a fix.

incidents.title: AdamRMS unavailable
incidents.description: Due to an unplanned platform migration, AdamRMS was breifly unavailable
incidents.content:
2020-12-29T13:22:00.000Z
Resolved

Service is back online and responding to requests, the alpha was promoted to the production service

2020-12-29T13:03:00.000Z
Ongoing

Due to a configuration error with the service's SSL certificate at a CDN level, an attempt to setup a alpha build of the production service to test a new cloud platform provider is inadvertently causing requests to the main production server to fail.

incidents.title: Project Status not showing in AdamRMS
incidents.description: Attempts to view/change project statuses in AdamRMS are failing - colours navigation menu are also affected
incidents.content:
2020-12-29T14:52:00.000Z
Resolved

A bugfix has been pushed to the live service

2020-12-29T13:03:00.000Z
Ongoing

Cause has been traced to a minor bug in a software update

incidents.title: AdamRMS unavailable
incidents.description: an upgrade to the RAM available on the host server, performed by the server provider, caused the database to be briefly unavailable
incidents.content:
2020-10-21T17:49:00.000Z
Resolved

Server has come back online

incidents.title: AdamRMS down for maintenance to database
incidents.description: To resolve intermittent database issues, AdamRMS's database will be migrated to a new cluster requiring downtime
incidents.content:
See https://status.jbithell.com/incidents/3e2e32c5 for details of original incident

2020-09-10T11:20:00.000Z
Paused

Migration has been paused and the dashboard brought back online

incidents.title: AdamRMS failing to load intermittently
incidents.description: AdamRMS's database is experiencing issues relating to PDF generation which will be resolved in a later maintenance
incidents.content:
2020-09-15T18:00:00.000Z
Updated

Issues have been resolved for all areas except PDF generation which is set to be resolved in planned maintenance

2020-09-15T13:40:00.000Z
Investigating

Issues have been resolved with notifications, the api and the app

2020-09-10T09:50:00.000Z
Investigating

Engineering have begun to bring a new database cluster online

2020-09-10T05:39:00.000Z
Notified

Automated montioring triggered a notification of degraded performance for AdamRMS

incidents.title: AdamRMS App shows 'error-error'
incidents.description: AdamRMS's security system is preventing the app from connecting
incidents.content:
AdamRMS's security system is preventing the app from connecting

2020-09-03T09:27:00.000Z
Resolved

An update has been submitted to the stores to resolve this

2020-09-03T08:49:00.000Z
Workaround

Logging out then back into the app is confirmed to resolve the issue. Severity is being downgraded to degraded performance

2020-09-03T08:46:00.000Z
Notified

Automated montioring and a client both triggered a token expiry exception
